title: Great place to work
pros: Lots of benefits and great office

title: Wonderful work life balance
pros: Hard working employees and management, open to fresh perspectives, understanding that we are all human and have lives outside of work.
cons: No cons working here so far.

title: Average Company, Average Employees, Below Average Pay
pros: Lacking many besides work life balance. It's a punch in / punch out culture
cons: Pay is laughable compared to market

title: Employee centric, women owed, great place to work
pros: Culture of fun, employee ownership, competitive pay and benefits
cons: The standard amount of vacation time is low.

title: Great company
pros: This is a great company to work for! Great benefits and atmosphere
cons: Before going public, company seemed to care more for employees

title: Great place
pros: - Friendly people - Good pay - interesting work
